name: Live2D Wallpaper
detailed_description:
About Live2D Wallpaper

Do you want a Live2D mascot in your desktop wallpaper and communicate with it?
Do you want a fantastic live wallpaper on both Windows and MacOS?
Live2D Wallpaper is just for you!

Features

  • Multiple model display
  • Free move and scale
  • Add Live2D models：support json files and lpk files(a format from Live2DViewerEX)
  • Let users make and upload models to workshop
  • Add backgrounds：support images and videos
  • Stage effects, filters and widgets
  • Support multi-display

Quick Start

Please watch the video of "Quick Start"

Important

  • Add the app to white list if any antivirus software installed
  • Auto-Pause not supported currently, please do it manually when you need
  • Before use this app you must enable Areo theme if your OS is Windows 7
  • About system resource usage, due to the limitations of Unity it is worse than native apps.
  • About the workshop: welcome to share your models to others, but please do not upload any illegal contents.

Roadmap

  • Function: Snapshot
  • Function: Random models display
  • Widget: Music Player
  • Widget: Desktop Tool
  • Widget: Resource Monitor
  • Language: Japanese
  • APP: Live2D Wallpaper for MacOS
  • APP: Steam Stats and Achievements
  • APP: Live2D SDK3.0 intergration

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (with Aero), 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: Intel i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: HD Graphics 4000 or above
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 8.1, 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660, AMD HD7870, 2 GB VRAM or above
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
